Class GameTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameTimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This Class handles everything to do with time in my game, it controls the reload time for the player to shoot, it controls how long the game pauses for, etc
    Author:
    elan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      depending on the type the timer will, reload the shooters gun, cause enemies to shoot, activate and deactivate power ups, pause and un-pause the game, spawn power ups
      static void initializeTimers()
      initializes the timers correctly
      static void updateEnemyFireTimer() 
      static void updatePowerUpTimer()
